code: public OperationResult<byte[]> getResult() {     try {         Stat statistics = connection.setData(node, data, version).         if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {             if (LOG.isTraceEnabled()) {                 LOG.trace(format("Set data of node '%s'  with '%d' bytes of data, retrieved statistics '%s' ", node, data != null ? data.length : 0, statistics)).             } else {                 LOG.debug(format("Set data of node '%s' with '%d' bytes of data", node, data != null ? data.length : 0)).             }         }         return new OperationResult<>(data, statistics).     } catch (Exception e) {         return new OperationResult<>(e).     } }
public void setVersion(int version) {     this.version = version. }

@Override public ZooKeeperOperation<?> createCopy() throws Exception {     SetDataOperation copy = (SetDataOperation) super.createCopy().     // set the version to -1 for 'any version'     copy.version = -1.     return copy. }
